text: yeon-yaghan jana byeongdeun ja geuligojeung-yeohal geos-i eobsneun jadeul-i nam-a iss-eum-eun joeag-i anigeoneul ineun geudeul i hananimgwa seonjijakke chungsilham-ilahananim-ui gil-eseo seon-eul haenghaneun ja deul-ege binanhal iyuga eobsgeoneul ha nanim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungman hasim ila
